description:
Our client is seeking for full-time remote role for a Game Developer. The Game Developer will be responsible for game programming, gameplay programming, programming, object-oriented programming (OOP), and game design. The Game Developer will also be responsible for collaborating with the design team and testing and debugging games.


Working time: Sunday to friday, 11 am to 6 pm


Bonus: if candidate is will to do extra after office hour. Also after each game completed
requirements:
• Proven track record of working on successful RPG titles from concept to release.
  • Extensive experience with game development frameworks and engines such as Unity.
  • Strong proficiency in programming languages commonly used in game development (e.g. C#).
  • Deep understanding of game design principles, mechanics, and player engagement dynamics.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues efficiently.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across multidisciplinary teams.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt quickly to changing project requirements and priorities.
  • Experience in developing 2D based role playing games.



Benefits:

  • Flexible working environment.
  • Opportunities for career growth and advancement in a rapidly expanding company.
responsibilities:
• Design, develop game functionality specifically tailored for MMO gameplay using Unity.
  • Design and architect the overall structure of the game, encompassing both front-end and back-end elements.
  • Solid experience in 2D game development with Unity gaming engine.
  • Programming, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), and Game Programming skills
  • Experience in Game Design
  • Ability to develop and debug games efficiently and effectively
  • Experience in the development of browser-based games.
  • A portfolio showcasing game development projects.
  • Manage the development roadmap, schedules, and resource allocation to ensure on-time delivery of milestones and project goals.
  • Conduct regular code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and implement best practices to optimize performance, stability, and code quality.
  • Stay current with emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in game development to drive continuous improvement and innovation.
  • Able to document the overall system design process.

description:
Our client is seeking a skilled and experienced PHP Developer with knowledge of web development to join their team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our e-commerce stores, with a specific focus on the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform. While prior experience with Shopify and bigcommerce is not required, the ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of web development basics and a willingness to learn and excel.

 

Location - Maitrinagar


Working hour - 9am -6pm


Lunch provided

Good holidays
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
  • Minimum of 2 years of professional web development experience
  • Solid understanding of web development fundamentals, including PHP and responsive design principles
  • Familiarity with Shopify is preferred, but not required. Willingness to learn and master the Shopify platform is essential
  • Experience in building and customizing websites using content management systems (CMS)
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently
  • Knowledge of web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to track website performance and user behavior
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies
  • Strong attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment

 

This is a full-time position located at our office, where you will receive training and guidance on using Shopify & Bigcommerce effectively. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and advancement in a fast-paced and innovative environment.


If you are a motivated web developer with a strong foundation in web development and a passion for e-commerce, we encourage you to apply. Join our team and expand your skills by learning and leveraging the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform to create exceptional online experiences for our customers.


Apply: You can send your resume at career@talentsathi.com.
responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain e-commerce websites, with a primary focus on the Shopify platform, ensuring high-quality and visually appealing user interfaces
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, marketers, and project managers, to implement website changes, updates, and new features
  • Customize and configure Shopify & Bigcommerce themes, templates, and plugins to meet specific project requirements and business needs
  • Ensure websites are optimized for performance, responsiveness, and SEO best practices
  • Troubleshoot and resolve any front-end and back-end issues that arise, including compatibility and functionality problems
  • Perform regular website maintenance tasks, such as monitoring site performance, managing content updates, and resolving technical glitches or bugs
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and new technologies related to web development, PHP, and e-commerce
  • Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and propose innovative ideas to improve user experience, conversion rates, and overall website performance
  • Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers or team members as needed
  • Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance to ensure the website's functionality and compatibility across different browsers and devices

Location: Jhamsikhel. Lalitpur


What they Offer:

  • Competitive salary and performance incentives.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
  • A collaborative and creative environment where your ideas will be heard.
  • Flexible work hours (We have 2 shifts: 7 am to 3 pm and 9 am to 5 pm)
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing or a related field or Proven experience as a Facebook and Google Ads Manager or similar role.
  • Experience in managing moderate to large-scale Facebook and PPC campaigns.
  • Strong understanding of current online marketing concepts, strategies, and best practices.
  • Experience in Facebook ads, PPC, Email marketing, and social media.

• Plan, create, and manage PPC campaigns across Facebook and Google Ads.


  • Conduct keyword research and selection for pay-per-click campaigns and SEO projects.

description:
Our client is seeking a skilled and enthusiastic Web Developer with knowledge of web development to join their team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our e-commerce stores, with a specific focus on the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform. While prior experience with Shopify and bigcommerce is not required, the ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of web development basics and a willingness to learn and excel.

 

Location - Maitrinagar


Working hour - 9am -6pm


Lunch provided

Good holidays
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
  • Minimum of 2 years of professional web development experience
  • Solid understanding of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript and responsive design principles
  • Familiarity with Shopify is preferred, but not required. Willingness to learn and master the Shopify platform is essential
  • Experience in building and customizing websites using content management systems (CMS)
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently
  • Knowledge of web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to track website performance and user behavior
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies
  • Strong attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment

 

This is a full-time position located at our office, where you will receive training and guidance on using Shopify & Bigcommerce effectively. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and advancement in a fast-paced and innovative environment.

If you are a motivated web developer with a strong foundation in web development and a passion for e-commerce, we encourage you to apply. Join our team and expand your skills by learning and leveraging the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform to create exceptional online experiences for our customers.


Note: Candidates with experience in any Frontend or Backend, programming languages such as PHP, JavaScript, HTML CSS, or others can apply.
responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain e-commerce websites, with a primary focus on the Shopify platform, ensuring high-quality and visually appealing user interfaces
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, marketers, and project managers, to implement website changes, updates, and new features
  • Customize and configure Shopify & Bigcommerce themes, templates, and plugins to meet specific project requirements and business needs
  • Ensure websites are optimized for performance, responsiveness, and SEO best practices
  • Troubleshoot and resolve any front-end and back-end issues that arise, including compatibility and functionality problems
  • Perform regular website maintenance tasks, such as monitoring site performance, managing content updates, and resolving technical glitches or bugs
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and new technologies related to web development, PHP, and e-commerce
  • Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and propose innovative ideas to improve user experience, conversion rates, and overall website performance
  • Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers or team members as needed
  • Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance to ensure the website's functionality and compatibility across different browsers and devices

This role offers the opportunity to significantly impact our digital products by designing intuitive, engaging user interfaces and experiences. The ideal candidate will have a robust understanding of Adobe Creative Cloud, Figma, and current design best practices. You will be responsible for creating visual elements, iconography, and entire app interfaces, applying product and color theory knowledge, and using psychological principles to influence user behavior and enhance user satisfaction.

We value self-motivation and the ability to work independently, as well as collaboratively, to meet project deadlines and objectives. If you are passionate about creating seamless, user-centered designs and eager to grow within a forward-thinking company, PropertyStack could be the perfect place for you to advance your career.
requirements:
1. Professional Experience: At least one year of hands-on experience with Figma and Adobe Creative Cloud tools.
  2. Strong Portfolio: A robust portfolio demonstrating experience in designing user interfaces and user experiences for applications. The portfolio should highlight key projects that showcase your skills in iconography, graphic design, and app interface development.
  3. Technical Proficiency: Solid understanding of UX/UI design principles, color theory, and product design.
  4. Communication Skills: Strong written and spoken English skills, with the ability to articulate design concepts and decisions clearly and effectively.
  5. Team Collaboration: Proven ability to work effectively in a team environment, collaborating closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders.
  6. Self-Motivation: High level of initiative and the ability to work independently on multiple projects under tight deadlines.
  7. Education: A degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, User Experience Design, or a related field is preferred, though substantial professional experience can substitute for formal education.

We are looking for a candidate who not only meets these technical and professional standards but also fits well within our dynamic, collaborative culture.
responsibilities:
1. Utilize Adobe Creative Cloud: Employ tools within the Adobe suite to create and refine digital assets and visual elements.
  2. Develop Iconography and Graphics: Design clear and compelling icons and graphics tailored to the specific needs of the PropertyStack platform.
  3. Design with Figma: Use Figma to create, prototype, and iterate on app pages and other digital interfaces.
  4. Strategic Feature Planning: Work collaboratively with product management and engineering teams to plan and integrate user-centric features into the product roadmap.
  5. Enhance User Experience: Continuously evaluate and enhance the user experience by implementing effective design strategies that address user needs and business goals.
  6. Apply Product and Color Theory: Integrate principles of product and color theory to improve interface design and usability.
  7. Influence Design with Human Psychology: Leverage an understanding of human biases and psychological principles to craft designs that enhance user engagement and satisfaction.
  8. Self-Management and Motivation: Demonstrate a high degree of self-motivation, managing time effectively to meet deadlines and project goals without direct supervision.
  9. Continuous Learning and Adaptation: Stay updated with the latest design trends, tools, and technologies, and be willing to adapt and learn new skills as required.
  10. Collaborate Across Teams: Engage with different teams across the company to ensure a cohesive and consistent user experience across all product touchpoints.

requirements:

description:
We are currently seeking talented individuals for a vacancy within a leading Korean company. The company started with a drone mapping project to help Nepal recover from the disastrous earthquake back in 2015. Through this project, we realized the possibility of creating new value by combining drone and photogrammetry technology, and we are convinced that technology could bring positive change to society.

The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.
requirements:
## Minimum Qualifications

– Minimum 1.5-2+ years of experience in relevant tech stack (ReactJS)
– Minimum 1+ years of experience developing ReactJS applications using TypeScript
– Strong knowledge and skills in the following technologies:
– Languages: JavaScript and TypeScript
– Framework: ReactJS
– Libraries: Redux, RxJS
– Web Technologies: HTML5, CSS, SCSS
– Experience writing tests and Continuous Integration
– Ability to build and maintain positive working relationships with stakeholders of various levels
– Excellent attention to detail and willingness to learn new software/processes
– Obsessed with pixel-perfecting UI/UX
– Able to use initiative and remain self-motivated
– Able to work calmly and effectively under pressure
– Maintaining confidentiality/discretion where required
– Open to taking on new challenges
– Proficient in communication in English (both written and verbal)
– Excellent communication skills for inter-team collaborations including engineers and designers
– Able to write technical and non-technical documentation to create and maintain Knowledge Base

## Preferred Qualifications

– Knowledge and experience implementing Atomic Design Pattern
– Knowledge and understanding of AWS Services
– Knowledge and experience with GIS Technologies
– Experience working with libraries such as Cesium, OpenLayers, WebGL (3D Rendering), Three.js
– Proactive and able to be self-managed

 

5 days working days (Monday - Friday)
      - Working time can be chosen from 7 -9 am (Starting time)  to 4 - 6 pm (ending time) NPT
      - Total 9 hours with an hour of lunch break
responsibilities:
– Writing code that is fit for purpose, is scalable, human-readable, and in line with industry best practice
– Quality control and assurance of the entire product lifecycle by testing various components such as functionality, UI/UX, and debugging where necessary
– Communicating with the product owner and lead to understanding their business goals and objectives, and interpreting that into the required changes to the platform where necessary
– Collaborating with other developers, teams, designers, and product manager to identify new features and create relevant prototypes for new product ideas
– Studying the problem statements and proposing solutions to decision-makers
– Working on full production cycles from brainstorming and rapid prototyping to developing fully-fledged systems and fine-tuning mechanics, as well as stress testing and bug fixing.
– Solving technical problems with simple, efficient, and effective code
– Writing technical and non-technical documentation
– Participate/Contribute in code peer review
– Performance evaluation of juniors/interns

description: As a Marketing Manager at our digital agency, you will be the superhero behind promoting our services and making sure the world knows about the awesome things we do. You'll be the captain of the marketing ship, steering our brand to success in the digital seas.
requirements:
1. Experience Explorer: 1+ years in marketing, especially in the digital realm. We need someone who's been around the block and knows the ins and outs of the digital landscape.

  2. Strategic Sage: A strategic mindset with a proven track record of creating and implementing successful marketing strategies. You've got the vision to see the big picture and the skills to make it happen.

  3. Communication Champ: Excellent communication skills – both written and spoken. You can craft compelling messages and inspire others to get on board.

  4. Team Whisperer: Experience in leading and managing a marketing team. You know how to bring out the best in people and foster a collaborative, creative environment.

  5. Data Dexterity: Proficiency in using analytics tools. You're not afraid of numbers; in fact, you love them and can turn data into actionable insights.

  6. Tech Savvy: Familiarity with the latest digital marketing tools and trends. You're not intimidated by technology – you embrace it and use it to your advantage.
responsibilities:
1. Strategy Guru: Develop and execute mind-blowing marketing strategies. Think of yourself as the architect of our success – plan, implement, and tweak strategies to ensure we stand out in the digital world.

  2. Content Commander: Oversee the creation of captivating content. From social media posts to blog articles, you'll be the chief storyteller, making sure our message is clear, compelling, and hard to ignore.

  3. Team Maestro: Lead a team of marketing enthusiasts. Your role is like conducting a symphony – everyone has their part, and you make sure the melody is harmonious. Provide guidance, support, and maybe a bit of cheerleading.

  4. Data Detective: Dive into analytics to uncover hidden insights. Numbers are your sidekick – use them to track the success of our campaigns, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.

  5. Tech Trailblazer: Stay on top of digital marketing trends and tools. You're the trailblazer, testing out new tech and strategies to keep us ahead of the curve.

  6. Brand Guardian: Protect and enhance our brand. You're the gatekeeper, ensuring consistency in our messaging and visuals across all platforms.
frontendDescription: As a Marketing Manager at our digital agency, you will be the superhero behind promoting our services and making sure the world knows about the awesome things we do. You'll be the captain of the marketing ship, steering our brand to success in the digital seas

description: As a videographer in a digital agency, your main job is to create awesome videos that help our clients showcase their products, services, or ideas. You'll be responsible for planning, shooting, and editing videos that tell a compelling story and grab people's attention online.
requirements:
1. Experience: Proven experience as a videographer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
  2. Technical Skills: Proficient in video editing software and familiar with various camera equipment.
  3. Creativity: A creative mindset with the ability to turn ideas into visually appealing content.
  4. Communication: Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with team members.
  5. Adaptability: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.
responsibilities:
1. Planning: Collaborate with clients and our team to understand their goals and message. Plan the shots, scenes, and overall flow of the video.

  2. Shooting: Use your camera skills to capture high-quality footage. This may involve setting up equipment, choosing the right angles, and working with lighting.

  3. Editing: Bring the footage to life in the editing room. Cut and arrange clips, add music, graphics, and effects to create a polished final product.

  4. Creativity: Bring fresh ideas to the table. Be innovative in how you tell a story visually and keep up with the latest trends in video production.

  5. Communication: Work closely with clients and the rest of the digital agency team to ensure everyone is on the same page and the final product meets expectations.

  6. Technical Skills: Stay on top of the latest video production technologies and techniques. This includes familiarity with various cameras, editing software, and other tools.

  7. Deadline Management: Deliver projects on time and within budget. Juggle multiple projects if needed.

description: As a Video Editor at our digital agency, you'll be the person who makes videos look awesome! Your job is to take raw video footage and turn it into cool, eye-catching content that our clients will love. We want someone who's good at using video editing software and has a creative touch.
requirements:
• You've edited videos before and can show us your work.
  • You know how to use video editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro.
  • You understand how videos are made and what makes them look good.
  • It's a bonus if you know about things like motion graphics and animation.
  • You can work on multiple projects and meet deadlines.
  • You have good ideas and can communicate well with others.
  • You need to have a good attitude.
responsibilities:
1. Edit Videos:

    • Take raw video clips and make them look polished and cool.
    • Add things like graphics and special effects to make the videos interesting.

  2. Work with Others:

    • Talk to our creative team and clients to understand what they want in the videos.
    • Come up with ideas and plans for making the videos great.

  3. Check Quality:

    • Make sure the videos look and sound good by adjusting things like colors and sound levels.
    • Check that the videos meet our standards.

  4. Keep Up with Trends:

    • Stay updated on what's new and cool in the video world.
    • Learn new skills and bring fresh ideas to the team.

  5. Manage Files:

    • Keep all our digital files organized so we can find them easily.
    • Work with the team to make sure our media library is neat and tidy.

  6. Talk to Clients:

    • Show drafts of the videos to clients and make changes based on what they want.
    • Talk to clients to understand what they're looking for in the videos.

description:
We are actively seeking a dynamic and experienced Software Engineer with a Bachelorâs degree in Computer Science or equivalent, and a minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience with Python & Django Rest Framework. The successful candidate should demonstrate expertise in object-oriented design, design patterns, and a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable web services within cloud environments.

Key Qualifications:

Education and Professional Experience:

  • Bachelorâs degree in Computer Science or equivalent,
  • Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in Python programming & Django Rest Framework,
  • In-depth knowledge of object-oriented design and design patterns.

Technical Proficiency:

  • Proven ability to build high-performance and scalable web services, leveraging cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Digital Ocean),
  • Strong skills in querying databases using SQL and/or ORMs,
  • Familiarity with Docker/Kubernetes,
  • Experience with cloud services, particularly AWS services such as S3, RDS, etc,
  • Proficiency in Django Rest Framework,
  • Expertise in developing RESTful APIs,
  • Knowledge and experience with WebSockets. 

Development Skills:

  • Expertise in API design, development, and documentation,
  • Ability to produce clean, scalable code adhering to established standards and tools.

Methodological Understanding:

  • Exposure to Agile/Scrum methodology is an advantageous asset.

Communication and Team Collaboration:

  • Outstanding written and verbal communication skills,
  • Exceptional analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving abilities,
  • Self-motivated, adaptable, and a team player with proficiency in multitasking, time management, and organizational skills.

If you are a proactive professional with a passion for delivering top-notch software solutions, enjoy working in a collaborative team environment, and possess a proven ability to meet project deadlines, we encourage you to apply. Join our innovative team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge technologies in a dynamic and rewarding work atmosphere.

Dhuni Software Pvt. Ltd is an equal opportunity employer, committed to fostering diversity and creating an inclusive workplace for all employees.

description:
• Prepare and cook menu items in accordance with established recipes and standards.
  • Ensure food quality, taste, and presentation meet company and customer expectations.
  • Coordinate with kitchen staff to prioritize orders and maintain efficient workflow.
  • Monitor food stock levels and replenish ingredients as needed to prevent shortages.
  • Maintain a clean and organized kitchen environment, including proper sanitation and hygiene practices.
  • Adhere to all safety and sanitation regulations and procedures.
  • Follow proper food handling and storage techniques to prevent spoilage and contamination.
  • Collaborate with kitchen team to develop new recipes and menu ideas.
  • Assist with inventory management, including tracking supplies and reporting discrepancies.
  • Communicate effectively with team members and management to ensure smooth operations.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a cook in a restaurant or similar setting.
  • Knowledge of various cooking techniques and cuisines.
  • Ability to work well under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
  • Excellent time management and organizational skills.
  • Strong attention to detail and commitment to food quality.
  • Certification in food safety and sanitation is preferred.
  • Physical ability to stand for extended periods and lift heavy objects.
  • Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as needed.

description:
About the Company:

Being Base Pvt. Ltd. is a company specializing in Import, Trading, Sales, Marketing and Distribution Sales of FMCG products. We provide our Sales and distribution network to help Top and Quality International as well as Domestic brands connect to the end consumers. The company aims to create world class Sales and Distribution Company with a professional outlook in Nepal. The present product and pipelined product category include Home Care, Personal Care and Food Products like Biscuits, Cookies, Pasta, Macaroni, Seviyan, Vermicelli, Corn Flakes, Soya chunks, Ketchup, Sauce, Chocolates etc. 

About the Business

The company has multiple warehouses across Nepal. Each warehouse has sales representative team, accounts department, driver, dispatch team and a warehouse manager. The Head office has central accounts, HR, Sales & marketing team, MIS, administration team.

 

Designation: Accountant

 

Qualification: Bachelor Degree or Master Degree

 

Job Location: Kupondole

Experience:

  • Minimum 3-6 years of experience in Accounts preferably in reputable company dealing with products 
  • Prior accounting software experience must

Skills:

  • Ensure that statements, income, expenses and records comply with laws and regulations.
  • Organize and maintain financial records finalize inputs for balance sheet and financial statements etc.
  • Prepare/monitor/update accounting vouchers, VAT register, TDS ï¬le, VAT submission, Day book, Journal Ledger, Party Ledger, 
  • Manage sales and purchase payments and update tracking payables and receivables

Salary:

  • Rs 25,000 to Rs 35,000

 

Resources Required:

  • Own a two-wheeler with a valid driving license

description:
• Assist with conducting research on current SEO trends and best practices.
  • Collaborate with the content team to optimize website content for search engines.
  • Support in keyword research and analysis to identify target keywords and phrases.
  • Assist in optimizing meta tags, headings, and other on-page elements.
  • Learn and implement link-building strategies to improve website rankings.
  • Assist in monitoring and analyzing website performance using SEO tools.
  • Support in creating SEO reports and providing recommendations for improvement.
  • Stay updated with industry news and developments in SEO techniques.

Other Specifications:

  • Pursuing a degree in Marketing in communications or in a related field,
  • Basic understanding of SEO principles and best practices,
  • Familiarity with keyword research tools and SEO analytics platforms,
  • Strong analytical skills and attention to detail,
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills,
  • Ability to work well in a team and take direction from senior team members,
  • Self-motivated with a desire to learn and grow in the field of SEO.

What We Offer: We are offering an exciting opportunity for an SEO Intern to join our team. As an SEO Intern, you will have the chance to gain hands-on experience in optimizing websites for search engines, creating SEO-friendly content, and learning about digital marketing strategies.

• Develop engaging and original content that aligns with our brand's voice, goals, and target audience,
  • Review and edit content for accuracy, clarity, and consistency. Ensure all content is free of grammatical, spelling, and punctuation errors.
  • Maintain the highest quality standards for all published content. Implement and uphold editorial guidelines and best practices.
  • Ensure all content aligns with our brandâs voice, tone, and style guidelines. Adapt content to suit different platforms and formats.
  • Work closely with writers, designers, and other team members to create cohesive and compelling content,
  • Contribute to the development and execution of content strategies that drive engagement and meet business objectives,

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a Content Editor, Copywriter, or similar role.
  • Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
  • Strong understanding of content management systems (CMS) and basic HTML.
  • Excellent attention to detail and a passion for maintaining high standards.
  • Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Familiarity with SEO best practices and content optimization techniques.
  • Bachelorâs degree in English, Journalism, Communications, or a related field is preferred.

description:
We are looking for enthusiastic and camera-friendly individuals to join our team as Video Content Models. As a Video Content Model, you will participate in a variety of video projects aimed at promoting our brand, products, and services. No prior experience is necessary all we require is a positive attitude and a willingness to be on camera.

Key Responsibilities:

On-Camera Presence: Appear in video content for various platforms including YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and the company website.
Modeling: Demonstrate and model products, participate in promotional videos, tutorials, advertisements, and other marketing content.
Acting: Act out scripted scenes and deliver lines as needed for video content.
Engagement: Interact with the camera in a natural, engaging manner to create compelling and relatable content.
Collaboration: Work closely with the video production and marketing teams to ensure the content aligns with brand objectives.
Adaptability: Be willing to adapt to different roles and scenarios as required for various video projects.
Flexibility: Participate in multiple takes and follow direction to achieve the desired outcome.

Qualifications:

Camera-Friendly: Comfortable being on camera and able to present oneself confidently and naturally.
Positive Attitude: Enthusiastic, outgoing, and open to taking direction.
Reliability: Punctual and dependable, with a commitment to meeting scheduled shoot times.
Versatility: Willing to participate in a variety of video types, from product demos to lifestyle content.
Communication: Good verbal communication skills to deliver lines and interact on camera effectively.

Requirements:

Age: Applicants must be at least [minimum age requirement, e.g., 18 years old,
Availability: Flexible schedule to accommodate filming sessions as needed.
Appearance: Maintain a well-groomed appearance suitable for camera work.

description:
• Arranging documents, certifying and processing applications assigned by the Counsellors,
  • Ensure that all documents are complete and comply with institutional and regulatory standards,
  • Process applications assigned by counsellors in a timely and efficient manner.
  • Input and update application data into the admissions database accurately,
  • Work closely with admission counsellors to clarify application details and requirements.
  • Communicate with prospective students and their families regarding missing documents, application status, and other inquiries,
  • Identify and suggest improvements to the admissions process to enhance efficiency and accuracy.

Key Requirements:

  • Basic Qualification should be at least bachelor's degree,
  • Basic knowledge of computer uses such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint,
  • Fluent in English + Nepali, speaking and writing, any work experience,
  • Happy to work in a group and understand the work environment in terms of using common sense.


Location: Kumaripati Lalitpur & BP Chowk, Pokhara

Salary: Attractive

description:
Key Responsibility Area (KRA): 

Advertisement Design

  • Assist in Creating Online Advertisements - coordinating with the Social Media team, outsourced designers, and design agencies.
  • Assist in Creating offline advertisements - coordinating with press agency

Branding Design

  • Creating online and offline branding advertisements
  • Creating designs for branding merchandise
  • Logo design - redesigning logos of ongoing products and creating new products
  • Coordinating with the Branding team
  • Coordinating with national and international vendor

Packaging Design

  • Redesigning packaging of ongoing products,
  • Creating packaging designs for new products,
  • Coordinating with national and international vendors,
  • Coordinating with the Procurement team

Corporate Design

  • Creating advertisements for company events,
  • Designing corporate merchandise - business cards, ID cards, letterhead, stamps, etc

description:
Personnel Administration

  • To take relevant actions and steps for the employees as corrective and preventive measures to control misconduct and miscreants
  • To maintain day-to-day functioning systems and work structures are ongoing smoothly in the entire department.
  • Managing dispute resolutions involving unions, management, contract negotiations, employees or government agencies, etc.
  • Deal with issues like regulations, control over work structures, risk prevention, collective bargaining, unions, industrial security
  • Coordinate & Schedule the CBA / LRC & Health & Safety Committee at least once in 3 months and report to the Corporate Office.

GR/IR/PR

  • To arrange for the Outsourcing of different functionalities and persons as per requirement
  • To work as a company representative for Relation/Rapport Building with stakeholders
  • To stay in line and work for all sorts of State & Line Agency relationships and related issues
  • To conduct Negotiations, Dealing, and representation on behalf of the company/management
  • To work as an essential authority in Conflict Management (Worker/ general employees) and Complaint Handling
  • To lead the tasks of Event Management- Eves, Sports, Welcome/Farewell, Felicitation and Parties/picnics

Estate and Property Management

  • Coordinate Civil Construction, Housekeeping, Pantry, Canteen, Carpentry, electricity, plumbing, and other various units/entities for effective functioning
  • To monitor day to day of working stations and premises
  • To deliver the effective Guest Relation/Hospitality

Front Office (Reception/Customer Care Unit)

  • To ensure that communication network and channels are effectively performing
  • To maintain regular and effective correspondence within and outside
  • To be aware and get enrolled in guest relations and guest handling

 Security

  • Get briefed about Day-to-day Security System arrangements through the Security Manager
  • Plan for security arrangements for preventive and corrective safety of important office
  •  Arrange proper security measures for the systemization of incoming and outgoing materials, including inputs, products, byproducts, and other relevant items.

Gardening

  • Direct supervision for cleansing, displacing, filling, plantation, cutting, tree felling, and other relevant jobs.

Medicare

  • To regularize and upgrade the services of Medicare
  • To maintain effective service delivery of Vehicle / Ambulance

Office Transportation/Conveyance/ Weighing Bridge

  • To ensure that the office bearers and their relevant associates are provided with the office vehicles as per requirement,
  • Coordinating for the Air/Train/Bus Ticket and monthly mobile SIM card,
  • To systematize the conveyance for top management, senior officials, and general staff for functional requirements,
  • To arrange appropriate transportation for all office supplies, inputs, and products in a cost-effective and proper way,
  • To function the Weighing Bridge of the unit effectively to control fraudulent activities, misconducts, and miscreants,
  • Manage all sorts of legal & other relevdocumentationtion processes ,and authentications from line agencies

Administrative Management: Office and Office Supply

  • Ensure that all office bearers are provided with appropriate office supplies, including (but not limited to) stationeries, communication media, furniture & fixtures, electronics, and networking.
  • To ensure that all the staff are provided with appropriate office rooms and workspaces or quality workstations.

Administrative Management: Utilities

  • Ensure that telecommunications, networking, electricity, and other relevant utilities are paid for timely.
  • To maintain that safe drinking water supply and sanitation is assured and paid for in time.

NOTE: Other Roles and Responsibilities will be as suggested by the Unit Head or Immediate supervisor.

• Maintain accurate financial records, including ledgers, invoices, receipts, and reconciliations. 
  • Liaise with suppliers, negotiate terms and manage vendor accounts. 
  • Maintain stock record of showroom and stock of stockyard vehicles. 
  • Book Keeping and Accounting of Company. 
  • Stock Management, Recording Keeping, and Making Delivery all over Nepal. 
  • Preparing the reports twice a month basis. 
  • Delivery of Goods, Issuing Bills, Making VCTS Entry (vehicle tracking), 
  • Managing Transportation in cost cost-effective manner for deliveries. 
  • Ensure shipmentsâ and inventory transactionsâ accuracy. 
  • Maintain items record, document necessary information, and utilize reports to project warehouse status 
  • Efficiently supervise the loading/unloading of all route transports. 
  • Reconcile any inventory variances. 
  • Visit Head Office twice a month for a meeting with Director Sir & Accounts Department. 
  • Keeping track of the stock of Spares of the Company and preparing the report twice a month.

description:
• Overseeing the overall management of the factory premises, ensuring cleanliness, safety, and compliance with regulations.,
  • Coordinating with the HR department on matters related to employee recruitment, onboarding, attendance, leaves, and disciplinary actions,
  • Assisting in the preparation and management of the factory's budget, monitoring expenses, and identifying cost-saving opportunities.,
  • Collaborating with production, maintenance, quality control, and other departments to ensure smooth operations and address any issues that may arise,
  • Identifying areas for improvement in factory operations and processes, and implementing measures to enhance efficiency and productivity,
  • Being prepared to handle emergencies or crises that may arise in the factory, such as equipment failures, accidents, or natural disasters.


Requirement: 

  • Bachelor/ Master's degree in business management,
  • Must have 3+ years of working experience in administrative roles in factory lines,
  • Strong leadership and management ability for overseeing factory operation

Note: Two wheeler license is mandatory

description:
• Working with travel consultants from different travel agencies to put holiday packages together
  • Combining travel, accommodation and services such as sightseeing arrangements to create holiday packages.
  • Modifying tour packages as per the requirement of clients
  • Coordinate with Ticketing depart to get the cheapest airfare.
  • Coordinate with accounts depart and update the package, visa and ticket rates.
  • Coordinate tour leaders.
  • Using market research information to guide decisions
  • Collecting, evaluating and responding to customer feedback
  • Visiting hotels and resorts to ascertain accommodation quality and suitability
  • Keeping record of each and every group or individual travelers

Other Specification 

  • Understanding of international travel regulations, visas, and health and safety guidelines.
  • Ability to interact respectfully and effectively with clients and colleagues from diverse cultural backgrounds.
  • Willingness to work flexible hours, including weekends and holidays, and adapt to changing schedules and client needs.
  • Ability to handle multiple tasks and projects simultaneously while maintaining a high level of accuracy and attention to detail.
  • Ability to quickly and effectively address and resolve any issues or emergencies that arise during tours.

description:
• Book, Refund and Re-issue the tickets as suggested by clients
  • Make ticket booking, quote fare, and send to direct customers or Agents.
  • Prepare and forward daily sales report to the account department at every close
  • Calculate the best fares and optimal routes, and have persuasion skills
  • Provide customer care at all times.  Be able to communicate in English and Nepali at the business level.
  • Explain routing, visa rules, transits, etc.
  • Maintain accurate records and update PNR files.
  • Enlighten customers on the new and existing products of the company. 

Other Specification 

  • Depth knowledge of Travels and Tours Industry; IATA certification is preferred.
  • Should be familiar with online selling platforms like Amadeus, Sabre and/or Galileo.
  • Very knowledgeable in Ticketing and Reservations
  • Understanding of visa and entry requirements for countries. 
  • Excellent computer skills
  • Excellent marketing & communication skills
  • Microsoft Skills.
  • Fluent in English (Speaking and writing)

companyName: Royal Cleaning Services and Suppliers Pvt. Ltd.
description:
• Make outbound calls to prospective clients to introduce and promote our professional cleaning services.
  • Clearly explain our cleaning packages, pricing, and service details to potential customers.
  • Actively listen to customer requirements and effectively handle inquiries, providing accurate information.
  • Process orders from customers over the phone, recording essential details for scheduling and invoicing.
  • Coordinate with our cleaning teams to schedule service appointments based on customer preferences and availability,
  • Follow up with customers to confirm appointments and address any concerns or special requests.

Other Specification:

  • High school diploma or equivalent. Additional education or training in sales or communication is a plus.
  • Proven experience as a telecaller or in a similar customer-facing role, ideally within the cleaning service industry.
  • Exceptional verbal communication and active listening skills.
  • Strong ability to effectively convey service details and pricing to potential clients.
  • Excellent problem-solving and interpersonal skills.
  • Proficiency in using CRM software and basic computer skills.
  • Capacity to work under pressure and meet order processing targets.
  • Customer-focused with an aptitude for building and maintaining positive client relationships.
  • Patience and professionalism when addressing customer inquiries and requests.
  • A strong work ethic and a commitment to ethical conduct.

Note: Freshers are also highly encouraged to apply.

companyName: Royal Cleaning Services and Suppliers Pvt. Ltd.
description:
• Identify and target potential clients within our service area to expand our client base.
  • Plan and execute field marketing campaigns, including door-to-door visits, community events, and local promotions to generate leads.
  • Conduct market research to understand local competition, customer needs, and emerging market trends.
  • Create and distribute marketing materials such as brochures, flyers, and promotional giveaways.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with local businesses, community organizations, and residential clients.
  • Attend networking events, trade shows, and community gatherings to represent the company and generate leads.
  • Schedule and attend meetings with potential clients to present our cleaning services and negotiate agreements.
  • Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement effective marketing strategies.
  • Prepare and deliver persuasive presentations to potential clients to showcase our services.
  • Maintain accurate records of marketing activities, client interactions, and lead generation efforts.

Other Description:

  • High School Degree in marketing, business, or a related field (preferred).
  • Proven experience in field marketing, sales, or a related role, preferably in the cleaning service industry.
  • Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build and maintain positive client relationships.
  • Knowledge of marketing principles and strategies.
  • Networking abilities to establish a local network of contacts.
  • Creativity and the ability to develop innovative marketing campaigns.
  • Basic computer skills and proficiency in using marketing tools and software.
  • A valid driver's license and reliable transportation.
  • Ability to work independently and stay self-motivated.
  • Exceptional problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Location: Available in Gothathar and Chabahil, Kathmandu

description:
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop sales strategies and action plans that drive business growth and increase market share.
  • Identify new opportunities, market trends, and customer needs to inform strategic decision-making.
  • Knowledge and experience in consumer goods sales, preferably in the FMCG and/or food industry.
  • Must be willing to travel within the assigned area as needed.
  • Develop and execute innovative strategies to identify and onboard new customers within the assigned territory.
  • Explore untapped market segments and niches to expand customer base.
  • Analyse market needs and trends, to identify and deliver strategies to support the company's business development plan.
  • Develop the Horeca channel focusing on the hotels/cafe/restaurants sector for sales of frozen snacks.
  • Responsible for identifying and securing new clients in addition to yielding existing clients to ensure revenue targets are met.
  • Maintain strong relationships with customers including distributors, wholesalers, and retailers.
  • Develop and maintain a high level of product and service knowledge to facilitate support to potential and existing clients.
  • Meet the sales targets and KPIs as set and agreed upon by the senior management.
  • Regular weekly reporting on all sales activities to monitor the success and effectiveness of activities.

Other Specification 

  • Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or any.
  • Proven track record with at least 4 years sales within FMCG industry particularly in departmental stores, retail stores and hotels/ restaurants and cafes preferably in frozen Foods.
  • Strong leadership, communication, negotiation, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Result-oriented with a focus on achieving targets and business growth.
  • Able to work independently, professionally and be a good team player.
  • An outspoken, cheerful, and dynamic character with a positive working attitude.
  • Able to interact with people of different levels.
  • Able to interpret sales data and market trends.
  • A record of achieving sales targets and increasing revenue.

description:
• Will be responsible for interacting with Customers & Handling Online Sales at our social media Platform.
  • Responsible for proper & attractive display of jewelry (when necessary).
  • Give knowledge & correct guidance to customers while they are making their purchase.
  • Sell Products by establishing contacts & developing relationships with the clients.
  • Achieve the sales target while maintaining utmost focus on quality of customer service.
  • Responsible for all point of sales activities coming through social media or digital space which includes; Sales Transaction, Tracking Customer Orders, Payments and confirmation of goods delivery.
  • Reviewing orders before and after delivery to ensure that orders are complete, the charges are correct, and the customer is satisfied.
  • Accepting payments for delivered items.
  • Providing excellent customer service, answering questions, and handling complaints from clients.
  • Providing After Sales service to the customers. Maintaining Inventory & Collection of Customer Data.
  • Ensure proper customer service by teaming with co-workers.
  • Attend and participate in sales meetings.
  • Assist with physical inventory counts.
  • Monitor loss prevention activities.
  • Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services

Other Specification:

  • Proven track record in sales, preferably in a B2B (business-to-business) environment.
  • Strong sales and negotiation skills, with the ability to close deals and meet sales targets.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, both written and verbal.
  • Self-motivated, driven, and results-oriented with a strong work ethic.
  • Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers.
  • Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales data and market trends.
  • Adaptability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic sales environment.
  • Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field (preferred but not required).

  • Self-motivated, driven, and results-oriented with a strong work ethic.
  • Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers.
  • Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales data and market trends.
  • Adaptability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic sales environment.
  • Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field (preferred but not required).

description:
• Conduct field visits and engage in door-to-door sales activities to identify potential customers and generate leads.
  • Present and promote our products/services to individuals, businesses, or organizations in the assigned territory.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to foster customer loyalty and retention.
  • Actively seek new business opportunities through proactive outreach and networking events.
  • Prepare and deliver persuasive sales pitches, presentations, and product demonstrations to highlight the value proposition.
  • Meet or exceed weekly/monthly sales targets and report progress to the marketing manager.
  • Continuously assess market trends, customer needs, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth.
  • Maintain a deep understanding of our products/services and stay updated with industry trends.
  • Participate in regular sales meetings and training sessions to enhance sales skills and product knowledge.
  • Stay informed about company policies, pricing, and promotional offers to provide accurate information to clients.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a Marketing Executive or similar sales role, preferably in a fieldwork capacity.
  • Strong sales and negotiation skills with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, both verbal and written.
  • Ability to build and maintain effective relationships with clients and team members.
  • Highly motivated and self-driven with a passion for achieving sales success.
  • Demonstrated ability to work independently and efficiently manage time and resources.
  • Familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) software and sales tools is a plus.
  • Valid driver's license and willingness to travel extensively within the assigned territory.
  • Proactive and adaptable with the ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment.
  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field is preferred.

description:
• Maintain and update financial records, including ledgers, journals, and accounts,
  • Prepare accurate and timely financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements,
  • Assist in the preparation and monitoring of budgets, and analyze financial performance against budget,
  • Prepare and file tax returns, and ensure compliance with local, state, and federal tax regulations,
  • Assist with internal and external audits, providing necessary documentation and support,
  • Manage accounts payable and receivable processes, including invoicing, payment processing, and reconciliation,
  • Conduct financial analysis and provide insights to support business decision-making,
  • Utilize accounting software and tools to manage financial data efficiently.

Other Specification:

  • Bachelorâs degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in accounting or a related role.
  • Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP, Oracle) and Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel).
  • Strong organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.

description:
1. B2B marketing
  2. Develop and execute marketing strategies to support sales service objectives and maximize customer satisfaction.
  3. Collaborate with the sales team to understand customer needs, market trends, and competitive landscape to develop effective sales service initiatives.
  4. Identify and implement improvements in the sales service process to enhance customer experience and drive customer loyalty.
  5. Create engaging and informative sales service materials, including presentations, brochures, guides, and FAQs.
  6. Support the sales team in delivering exceptional customer service throughout the sales cycle, including pre-sales, post-sales, and after-sales service.
  7. Develop and implement customer feedback mechanisms to gather insights and identify areas for improvement in the sales service process.
  8. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as product management and customer support, to align sales service strategies with overall business goals.
  9. Analyze sales service data, track key performance indicators (KPIs), and generate reports to measure the effectiveness of sales service initiatives.
  10. Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in sales service to identify opportunities for innovation and process enhancement.
  11. Conduct training sessions and workshops to educate the sales team on sales service techniques, customer handling, and effective communication skills.

Qualifications and Requirements:

  1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. A relevant master's degree is a plus.
  2. Proven work experience as a Marketing Executive or similar role, with a focus on sales service.
  3. Strong knowledge of marketing principles, sales service strategies, and customer experience management.
  4. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create impactful sales service materials and effectively communicate with customers and internal stakeholders.
  5. Strong analytical skills with the ability to analyze sales service data, track KPIs, and derive actionable insights.
  6. Familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) systems and sales service software.
  7. Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and sales representatives.
  8. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  9. Customer-centric mindset with a passion for delivering exceptional sales service and enhancing customer satisfaction.
  10. High level of adaptability and willingness to embrace change and innovation in the sales service process.
  11. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think strategically to drive sales service improvements.

Job location: Kathmandu and Biratnagar

Note: Salary will be reviewed on the basis of experience and performance.

description:
Position Overview:   

Sales and Marketing Officer will be responsible for consistent sales growth across all channels, developing strong relationships with corporate clients, onboarding outdoor catering and retail sales, and implementing effective in-store and local marketing strategies. S/he will also be responsible for maintaining accurate records of sales growth and marketing impact, assisting in data analysis to drive informed decision-making, and contributing to the overall brand visibility and customer engagement efforts. 

Roles and Responsibilities 

Sales Growth: 

Assist in implementing strategies to achieve consistent sales growth across all channels (dine-in, takeout, delivery, etc.). 

Support the development and execution of sales plans to maximize revenue and market share. 

Corporate Client Management: 

Assist in identifying and onboarding new corporate clients. 

Help maintain strong relationships with existing corporate clients to foster loyalty and repeat business. 

ODC / Retail Sales: 

Complete ownership of Outdoor Catering (ODC) and retail sales growth business. 

Assist in developing plans to enhance ODC and retail sales performance. 

In-store & Local Marketing: 

Help plan and execute in-store promotions and events to attract and retain customers. 

Assist in developing and implementing local marketing strategies to increase brand visibility and customer footfall. 

Data Management: 

Maintain records of sales growth and marketing impact data. 

Assist in analyzing sales and marketing data to measure effectiveness and support data-driven decisions. 

Skills and Qualifications 

Task Related 

Bachelor's degree in marketing, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred. 

Experience in sales and marketing, preferably within the restaurant or hospitality industry. 

Strong understanding of sales principles and customer service practices. 

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 

Ability to develop and maintain professional relationships with clients and stakeholders. 

Proficiency in data analysis and reporting. 

Creative thinking and problem-solving skills. 

Competencies and Soft Skills 

Strategic planning and execution 

Relationship management 

Sales and marketing analytics 

Event planning and coordination 

Excellent communication skills 

Proactive and results-oriented

description:
• Assist in the installation of solar panels, inverters, and related equipment.
  • Ensure installations comply with industry standards and safety regulations.
  • Perform regular maintenance on solar power systems.
  • Diagnose and repair system malfunctions.
  • Conduct system performance tests and troubleshoot issues.
  • Assist with electrical wiring and connections for solar installations.
  • Ensure electrical work complies with local and national electrical codes.
  • Maintain accurate records of installations, maintenance, and repairs.
  • Prepare reports on system performance and issues.
  • Identify and mitigate potential safety hazards on-site,
  • Stay updated with advancements in solar technology and industry best practices.

Other Specification:

  • High school diploma or equivalent.
  • Technical certification in a relevant field is preferred.
  • Additional training or certification in solar energy technology is a plus.
  • Previous experience in solar panel installation or electrical work is preferred.
  • Experience with troubleshooting and maintaining solar power systems is desirable.
  • Strong understanding of electrical systems and components.
  • Ability to read and interpret technical drawings and schematic
  • Ability to work at heights and in various weather conditions.
  • Ability to lift heavy equipment and materials.

description:
• Manage and evaluate supplier performance, conduct regular assessments, and resolve any supplier-related issues,
  • Identify, evaluate, and onboard reliable suppliers/vendors by company policies and quality standards.
  • Develop and maintain strong relationships with suppliers, negotiate favorable terms, and manage contracts,
  • Collaborate with relevant departments to understand procurement needs and develop effective procurement strategies,
  • Analyze pricing and market trends to optimize procurement costs without compromising quality.
  • Support budget planning and adherence, tracking procurement expenses, and reporting on variances,
  • Continuously evaluate and enhance procurement processes to streamline operations and improve efficiency.

Other Specification:

  • Graduate in any discipline with relevant work experience of a minimum of 5 years in the Hydro Industry,
  • Proven experience 5-9 years in procurement, sourcing, or supply chain management.
  • Strong negotiation and contract management skills.
  • Proficiency in MS Office and familiarity with procurement software/tools (e.g., ERP systems).
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Analytical mindset with the ability to make data-driven decisions.
  • Detail-oriented, organized, and capable of managing multiple tasks efficiently.

description:
• Conduct geological fieldwork, including mapping, sampling, and surveying.
  • Collect and analyze rock, soil, and water samples for geological assessments,
  • Create detailed geological maps and cross-sections.
  • Interpret aerial photographs, satellite imagery, and geophysical data,
  • Identify and classify rocks and minerals using petrographic microscopes and other tools.
  • Analyze mineral compositions and rock formations,
  • Perform geochemical sampling and laboratory analysis.

Other Specification:

  • Masterâs degree in Geology, Earth Sciences, or a related field,
  • Previous experience in geological fieldwork, research, or related projects.
  • Experience with geological software and tools is preferred,
  • Proficiency in geological mapping, GIS, and remote sensing.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

description:
About the Company:

Being Base Pvt. Ltd. is a company specializing in Import, Trading, Sales, Marketing and Distribution Sales of FMCG products. We provide our Sales and distribution network to help Top and Quality International as well as Domestic brands connect to the end consumers. The company aims to create world class Sales and Distribution Company with a professional outlook in Nepal. The present product and pipelined product category include Home Care, Personal Care and Food Products like Biscuits, Cookies, Pasta, Macaroni, Seviyan, Vermicelli, Corn Flakes, Soya chunks, Ketchup, Sauce, Chocolates etc. 

About the Business

The company has multiple warehouses across Nepal. Each warehouse has sales representative team, accounts department, driver, dispatch team and a warehouse manager. The Head office has central accounts, HR, Sales & marketing team, MIS, administration team.

Responsibilities:

  • To visit the, Kirana shop, Khaja Ghar, Retail shop, Cosmetic shop etc. and take order of our products (Field Job)
  • Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and potential clients,
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction,
  • Conduct sales presentations, product demonstrations, and negotiations with clients.
  • Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and pipeline status.
  • Prepare regular reports on sales performance, market trends, and client feedback.

Other Specification:

  • Less than or equal to 4years as SR or Equivalent in Field Order Taking Roles,
  • SLC/10+2/ Bachelorâ s in any related field,
  • Strong understanding of sales principles and techniques.
  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.

Benefits:

  • Company provided Sim Card after 14 Working days
  • Incentive as per company rules

NOTE:

Designation:  Senior Sales Representative (Field Job)

No of Positions: 10

Joining: Urgent

Job Location:  Koteshwor, Lalitpur, Bhaktapur

description:
This is a full-time on-site role for a Customer Service cum Sales Executive located in Kathmandu. The Customer Service cum Sales Executive will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service, handling inquiries and complaints, assisting customers with product information, and upselling products and services. The role also involves generating sales leads and meeting sales targets.

Responsibilities:

  • Assist customers with product information, helping them make informed purchasing decisions.
  • Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through friendly and effective communication,
  • Upsell products and services to existing and potential customers.
  • Generate sales leads and actively seek out new sales opportunities.
  • Achieve and exceed sales targets set by the management,
  • Assist in preparing sales proposals, quotes, and contracts,
  • Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to implement sales strategies.

Qualifications

  • Excellent customer service and communication skills,
  • Strong sales and negotiation skills,
  • Ability to handle customer inquiries and complaints,
  • Knowledge of sales techniques and strategies,
  • Experience in customer service or sales roles,
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment,
  • Strong problem-solving skills,
  • Ability to meet sales targets,
  • Positive attitude and willingness to learn,
  • Education: bachelor completed,
  • At least 6 months experience in sales or customer service
     

Note:

  • Time: 7 AM to 3 PM
  • Location: New Baneshwor
  • Salary: Negotiable

description:
• Collect food orders from the restaurant and ensure they are accurately packed.
  • Plan and follow the most efficient delivery routes to reach the customers' locations promptly.
  • Handle multiple orders simultaneously and prioritize deliveries based on time sensitivity.
  • Provide excellent customer service during the delivery process, including friendly greetings, maintaining professionalism, and addressing any customer inquiries or concerns.
  • Handle cash payments and provide accurate change if necessary.
  • Verify order details and ensure all items are accurately delivered to the customers.
  • Adhere to traffic laws, safety regulations, and company policies while riding/driving.
  • Maintain a safe and responsible riding/driving behavior to ensure personal safety 
  • Maintain effective communication with the restaurant, customer support, or dispatch teams to update order status, address delivery-related issues, and provide timely updates.
  • Submit delivery logs or reports as required by the company.

Requirements:

  • Valid driver's license or rider's license, as required by local regulations.
  • Reliable mode of transportation (bicycle, motorcycle, scooter, car) with appropriate registration and insurance, if applicable.
  • Strong knowledge of local areas, roads, and navigation methods.
  • Good verbal communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with customers.
  • Time management skills to ensure timely deliveries and prioritize tasks effectively.
  • Physical stamina and fitness to handle the physical demands of delivery work.
  • Safety-conscious attitude and adherence to traffic laws and regulations.
  • Flexibility to work shifts, including evenings, weekends, and holidays, based on business needs.
  • Basic proficiency in using mobile applications or GPS devices for navigation purposes.
  • Previous experience in food delivery or a similar role is preferred but not required.

What we offer: 

  • The company takes care of providing the fuel expenses.
  • Per day basis salary
  • Earn a minimum of 60-120 per order.

description:
Job Overview

As a Head Chef, s/he will be responsible for overseeing the kitchen operations, managing a team, and ensuring the highest quality of food preparation and presentation. S/he will work closely with the management team to develop menus, maintain inventory levels, and uphold food safety standards.

General responsibilities (including but not limited to):

  • Lead and manage the kitchen team to deliver high-quality dishes that exceed guest expectations
  • Oversee food preparation, cooking, and presentation to ensure consistency and quality
  • Train and mentor kitchen staff to enhance their skills and performance
  • Should be able to provide direction for all day-to-day operations in the kitchen;
  • Utilizes interpersonal and communication skills to lead, influence, and kitchen staff;
  • Provides guidance and direction to subordinates, including setting performance standards and monitoring performance;
  • Provides and supports service behaviors that are above and beyond for customer satisfaction and retention;
  • Maintaining the kitchen and surrounding areas in condition that meet the company standards and health code regulations;
  • Actively involved in menu development and maintaining updated and accurate costing of all dishes prepared and sold in the Food and Beverage operation;
  • Follows proper handling and right temperature of all food products;
  • Ensures all equipment in the kitchen is properly maintained and in working order by local Health department and hotel standards;
  • Identifies the developmental needs of kitchen staff and provides coaching, mentoring, and also helping them to improve their knowledge or skills;
  • Delegates as appropriate to develop supervisors and subordinates to accept responsibility and meet clearly defined goals and objectives;
  • Review staffing levels to ensure that guest service, operational needs, and financial objectives are met;
  • Ensures compliance with food handling and sanitation standards;
  • Ensures disciplinary procedures & and documentation are completed according to Company Operational Standards and Management Policy;
  • Frequently review finished products for quality and presentation before the orders are sent to guests;
  • Review weekly and monthly schedules to meet forecast and budget;
  • Able to perform additional duties as requested by the management as and when required.
  • Collaborate with the management team to develop and implement strategies for business growth

Qualifications:

Education: Culinary school degree or equivalent; additional certifications are a plus.

Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience as Head Chef or similar role in a high-volume kitchen 

Skills:

  • Strong culinary skills and expertise in menu planning.
  • Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work well under pressure and in a fast-paced environment.
  • Exceptional organizational and problem-solving abilities.

Initiative: Proactively contribute ideas for process improvements, menu enhancements, and overall kitchen efficiency.

Flexibility: Willingness to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as needed.

description:
Designation: Operation Manager

Reports to: International General Manager

Company: Momoway Pvt. Ltd.

Unit: Chitwan Hotel and Restaurant Pvt ltd. (Canteen)

Location: Maharajung, Kathmandu, Nepal

Shift: Standard (09:00 AM to 06:00 PM) from Sunday to Friday

 

Position Overview:

The Operations Manager is responsible for formulating strategies, improving performance, procuring material and resources, and securing compliance in coordination with the management in one of our units (Chitwan Hotel and Restaurant at Kanti Hospital). S/he shall oversee and coordinate the daily operations of the organization. S/he will work closely with various teams to streamline operations, improve overall performance, increase quality of customer service, and implement best practices across all levels.

Roles and Responsibilities

Operations:

  • Optimize operations by implementing efficient workflows, procedures, and scheduling to meet customer demand while controlling costs.
  • Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction by monitoring service quality, addressing customer feedback, and resolving issues promptly and professionally.
  • Forecast and oversee the daily, and monthly expenses in coordination with the finance department
  • Communicate with the units for daily, weekly purchase orders and bills for further processing.
  • Work within existing policies and procedures, and safety regulations to ensure goals are achieved relating to revenue and growth.

 

 

Vendor/Procurement and Inventory:

  • Build and maintain relationships with suppliers, negotiate contracts, and monitor deliveries to secure high-quality ingredients and cost-effective supplies.
  • Forecast demand to ensure adequate inventory levels are maintained.
  • Monitor inventory levels and track inventory movements.
  • Implement measures to prevent stockouts and minimize excess inventory.

Others:

  • Collaborate with marketing teams to execute promotional campaigns, events, and marketing strategies to attract and retain customers.
  • Monitor budget and financial performance, analyze sales data, and implement cost-control measures to achieve financial targets.
  • Oversee shift schedules, staffing levels, and labor costs to ensure optimal coverage during peak hours and maintain a smooth operation.
  • Prepare and provide reports to the management.
  • Coordinate with vendors for repair and maintenance as per the requirement.
  • Oversee the completion of different projects (start to end).

Skills and Qualifications

Task Related

  • Bachelor's degree in hospitality management, business administration, or a related field (preferred).
  • Proven experience as an Operations Manager or in a similar leadership role within the restaurant industry.

Competencies and Soft Skills

  • Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Knowledge of food safety regulations
