description:
JOB DESCRIPTION: SHIFT SUPERVISOR

JOB TITLE: Shift Supervisor

DEPARTMENT: Operations

REPORTS TO: Unit Manager

DUTY STATION: Sanepa, Lalitpur

___________________________________________________________________________

Position Overview

The Shift Supervisor is responsible for ensuring that the restaurant operation runs smoothly. He/she shall oversee the activities of restaurant employees, expedite customerâs orders as needed, and maintain a good working relationship with the supplier. 

Roles and Responsibilities

General Management

  • Planning and delegating work duties to the staff and ensuring that they work according to the compliance of the restaurant business
  • Checking in on dining customers to enquire about food quality and services.
  • Manage the restaurant as appropriate to achieve customer satisfaction and quality service.
  • Implement company programs and manage the operations as required to ensure compliance with SOP
  • Coordinate the operation of the restaurant ensuring that kitchen, bar and waiting staff are working as a team.
  • Monitoring inventory and ensuring that all food supplies and other restaurant essentials are adequately stocked.
  • Monitoring the restaurantâs cash flow and settling outstanding bills.
  • Reviewing customer surveys to develop and implement ways to improve customer service.
  • Record the weekly expenses and provide measures to overcome the expenses. 

Quality Management and Assurance

  • Conducting regular inspections of the restaurant kitchen to determine whether proper standards of hygiene and sanitation are maintained.
  • Overseeing food preparation, presentation, and storage to ensure compliance with food health and safety regulations.
  • Ensure that operational and training standards are consistently followed and executed.

Relationship Management

  • Assist in recruitment, train the old and new employees to attend guests and provide customer service. 
  • Coach, provide feedback and develop a healthy culture and performance within the team
  • Assess and improve the performance of employees in a timely manner.

Reporting

  • Prepare reports at the end of the shift/week, including staff control, food control and sales
  • Reporting on a regular basis to the Line Manager.

Skills & Qualifications

Task Related skills

  • Bachelor's degree in business management; hospitality management or related field
  • 2+ years of experience working as a restaurant supervisor or a similar position. 
  • Professional certification as a Certified Restaurant Supervisor will be an advantage

Competencies and Soft Skills

  • Must have good communication skills in both English and Nepali
  • Ability to work effectively under time constraints and deadlines.
  • Ability to move throughout all food and beverage areas and continuously perform essential job functions.
  • Able to deal with confidential information and/or issues using discretion and good judgment
  • Strong leadership, motivational, and people skills
  • Strong decision-making skills and a results-driven approach
  • Good understanding of useful computer programs (MS Office, POS)
  • Positive attitude and willingness to assist others.
  • Ability to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as needed.

description:
• Design and edit with a purpose, creating graphics and videos that not only look fantastic but also align perfectly with our growth-driven marketing strategies.
  • Track-record in the use of animation software and Video Editing skills.
  • Support the team in generating ideas, concepts, and visual direction in line with the brand voice and personality, with a specific focus on digital platforms
  • Translate creative concepts into visual design using tools such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, Adobe Suite etc
  • Stay ahead of the curve on the latest trends in design and video editing, ensuring our content remains fresh, relevant, and effective.
  • Understanding graphics/video optimization for different platforms (Facebook, Reels, Stories, Instagram etc.).
  • Other relevant duties as assigned by the management.

Other Specification 

  • Should be able to learn and adapt to new skills quickly.
  • Strong creative thinking, typography skills, color theory, and illustration.
  • A portfolio that screams creativity, skill, and a hint of genius.
  • Ability to understand the ideas from other domains and incorporate them into illustrations beautifully.
  • Strong interpersonal skills to work within a team environment.
  • Applicants with experience in social media handling will be given preference.

• Should involve in door to door sales
  • Develop and implement special sales activities
  • Present and sell company products and services to current and potential clients
  • Conduct Market Research to identify potential clients and industry trends.

  • Identify and pursue new sales opportunities through networking, cold calling, and market research.
  • Develop and maintain a pipeline of potential clients.
  • Prepare and deliver sales presentations to prospective clients.
  • Build and maintain relationships with journalists, bloggers, and media outlets.
  • Plan and execute public relations campaigns to promote the company and its products/services.

 

Notes: 

  • Salary: Rs. 13500 per month + Incentive+ Fuel
  • Required: 1 Male / 1 Female
  • Please note: Two-wheeler with valid License is required

description:
• Planning and executing audit engagements in accordance with relevant auditing standards and regulations
  • Developing audit programs, procedures, and testing methodologies
  • Collecting and analyzing financial data, records, and supporting documentation
  • Evaluating the adequacy and effectiveness of internal control systems
  • Preparing audit reports and presenting findings, recommendations, and audit opinions to management
  • Providing guidance and advice on improving internal controls, risk management, and operational efficiency
  • Keeping up-to-date with changes in auditing standards, regulations, and industry best practices
  • Participating in continuous professional development activities

Other Specification 

  • Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field
  • Proficient knowledge of auditing standards, principles, and methodologies
  • Strong analytical, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
  • Attention to detail and accuracy
  • Proficiency in auditing software and data analysis tools
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Age Limit : 30-45 years

• Conducting training needs analysis to identify skill gaps and training requirements
  • Designing, developing, and updating training curricula, materials, and multimedia presentations
  • Planning and organizing training schedules, logistics, and necessary resources

  • Knowledge of adult learning principles and various training methodologies
  • Ability to create engaging and interactive learning experiences
  • Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport with trainees
  • Excellent organizational, time management, and multitasking skills

Age Limit : 35-50

description:
• Manage all customer related activities, handling employees' immediate grievances, taking accountability of the regional and its functions.
  • Lead, motivate and improve the performance of the branch management team and ensure the achievement of goals and targets.
  • Achieving business goals and revenue targets.
  • Overseeing daily operations, managing budgets, and setting performance objectives.
  • Recruiting, training, and supporting general managers.
  • Developing and implementing business, marketing, and advertising plans.
  • Managing internal and external stakeholder relations and negotiating contracts.

  • High school diploma/GED (required) and a Bachelor's degree in business administration or management (preferred).
  • 3+ years of management and leadership experience.
  • Excellent communication, leadership, and decision-making skills.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office, CRM systems, and project management tools

description:
• Greet customers, assess their needs and provide personalized assistance and product recommendations.
  • Provide excellent customer service by assisting customers in a friendly and professional manner, answering their questions, and offering product recommendations.
  • Process customer transactions accurately,
  • Operate cash registers and handle customer transactions accurately and efficiently.
  • Maintain a clean and organized sales floor, ensuring products are properly displayed.
  • Collaborate with the sales team to achieve sales targets and contribute to team success.
  • Stay up to date with product knowledge to effectively communicate features and benefits to customers.
  • Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues in a professional and timely manner.
  • Assist in monitoring and reporting on sales activities, including customer feedback and market trends, to contribute to sales strategies and improvement opportunities.

Requirements:

  • High school diploma or equivalent.
  • Strong customer service and communication skills.
  • Basic numerical skills for processing transactions.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
  • Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required.

description:
• Perform live music at scheduled events, concerts, and venues, either as a solo artist or as part of a band or ensemble.
  • Create and compose original music, including melodies, lyrics, and arrangements.
  • Maintain a diverse repertoire of music, spanning various genres and styles, to cater to different audiences.
  • Be adaptable to different musical environments and open to exploring new musical styles and projects.

Other Specification

  • Writing, rehearsing, performing, and recording new, original music.
  • Building strong relationships with other artists as well as fans.
  • Going for vocal training, and expanding your skill set by learning new techniques and instruments.
  • Showing up on time and well-rested for scheduled performances and recording sessions.
  • Building a positive brand by giving interviews and making appearances on radio and television.
  • Maintaining a strong social media presence by posting regular, relevant content, and interacting with fans online.
  • Reaching out to and collaborating with other artists and professionals in the entertainment industry.
  • Upholding a suitable, professional public image at all times.
  • Traveling abroad when required.

description:
• Conceptualizing creative ideas with clients.
  • Testing and improving the design of the website.
  • Establishing design guidelines, standards, and best practices.
  • Maintaining the appearance of websites by enforcing content standards.
  • Designing visual imagery for websites and ensuring that they are in line with branding for clients.
  • Working with different content management systems.
  • Communicating design ideas using user flows, process flows, site maps, and wireframes.
  • Incorporating functionalities and features into websites.
  • Designing sample pages including colors and fonts.
  • Working with the web designer to ensure consistent standards of SEO.
  • Giving feedback to the digital marketing team about SEO.

Job Specification:

  •  A relevant diploma in a related field.
  • Proficiency in graphic design software including Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and other visual design tools.
  • Proficiency in front-end development web programming languages such as HTML and CSS, JQuery, and JavaScript.
  • Good understanding of content management systems.
  • Good understanding of search engine optimization principles.
  • Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues.
  • Excellent visual design skills.
  • Up-to-date experience with international web protocols, standards, and technologies.
  • Creative and open to new ideas.
  • Adaptable and willing to learn new techniques.
  • Excellent communication skills.

description:
This is a full-time on-site role as a Hostel Warden located in Kathmandu. As a Hostel Warden, you will be responsible for day-to-day tasks such as overseeing hostel operations, ensuring the safety and well-being of residents, managing room allocations, maintaining cleanliness, and resolving any conflicts or issues that may arise. Additionally, you will be responsible for maintaining documentation, enforcing hostel rules and regulations, and building a positive and inclusive community among residents.

  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills
  • Ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks
  • Attention to detail and organizational skills
  • Ability to work independently and in a team
  • Prior experience in a similar role or customer service is preferred
  • Basic computer skills
  • Fluency in Nepali and English languages

description:
• Manage the promotion and distribution of ophthalmology products.
  • Oversee the sales strategies for pediatric and neonatology products.
  • Develop marketing plans for radiology products.
  • Conduct sales and marketing activities for urology products.
  • Handle the marketing and sales of hospital furniture.
  • Coordinate the promotion of OT equipment.
  • Implement sales strategies for CSSD.
  • Engage in marketing efforts for hospital infrastructure.
  • Focus on the sales of critical care products.
  • Drive the marketing and sales of dental equipment and consumables.
  • Promote and sell ENT products.
  • Manage the sales and marketing of neurology/neurosurgery products.

Requirements:

  • BBA/BBS with specialization in Marketing Management (preferable with Technical Diploma in Biomedical / Electric / Electronics / Mechanical Engineering or solid 1-3 years work experiences as Sales Manager/Officer/Executives in Medical Sectors with Science/Biology background
  • 1-3 Minimum  Yrs. Experience in Trading Business - Import/Export/Merchandising - preferably in supply of Medicines & related Medical Equipment and Accessories in various Health Care/Medical Divisions throughout Nepal.
  • Familiarity with the products or services being offered by the company.
  • Demonstrated ability to generate leads, negotiate, and close deals.
  • Proficient in developing and implementing marketing strategies.
  • Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients.

• Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and live chat with professionalism and courtesy.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve customer issues and complaints with the aim of enhancing customer satisfaction.
  • Document and escalate customer feedback and issues to relevant departments to improve product and service quality.
  • Maintain a thorough knowledge of the companyâs products, services, and customer service policies.
  • Communicate and coordinate with internal departments to resolve customer issues efficiently.
  • Follow up with customers to ensure their issues are resolved and they are satisfied with the solutions.
  • Participate in training sessions to stay updated on product developments or changes in service policies.

Other Specification 

  • Familiarity with CRM systems and practices.
  • Certification in customer service is a plus.
  •  Proven customer support experience or experience as a client service representative.

description:
• Design and improve the user interface for our website, ensuring it is visually appealing and easy to navigate.
  • Create user-centric designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback.
  • Collaborate with the development team to ensure the technical feasibility of designs.
  • Conduct user research and evaluate user feedback to enhance the usability of the website.
  • Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders.
  • Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate site function and appearance.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role.
  • Portfolio of design projects showcasing creativity and depth of thought.
  • Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Figma, Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
  • Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders.
  • Good time-management skills.

Benefits:

  • Opportunity to work with a dedicated and passionate team.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Professional growth and development opportunities.

description:
We are hiring paid business development associate intern for logistics company. 

  • Make and maintain a complete customer database in all targeted categories including existing and previous customers, as well as approach new customers,
  • Plan, strategize, and approach customers based on different products and services,
  • Analyze the sales performance in terms of retaining old and existing customers,
  • Other duties as assigned.

Other Specification:

  • Good spoken and written communication skills,
  • Friendly and able to coherently work with teams,
  • Basic knowledge and understanding of marketing and sales,
  • Good interpersonal skills,
  • Basic understanding of Excel,
  • Preference shall be given to BBA/BBM students,
  • Preference shall be given to the candidate having two-wheelers with a valid license 

NOTE: The internship will be for the first three months, and then it will be converted to a full-time staff.

description:
• Managing regular inventory and reconciliations Orders, Cash Collection, COD Payment, etc. 
  • Processing and fulfilling customer orders accurately and efficiently coordinating with the team to ensure timely picking, packing, and shipping of orders, and handling order discrepancies and returns.
  • Coordinating with team and rider to prepare route optimization and scheduling shipments with rider and 3PL logistics partners. Tracking shipments to ensure timely delivery and resolving any issues that arise during the shipping process
  • Developing and implementing logistics strategies to improve efficiency and reduce costs. Planning and optimizing routes for transportation to minimize delivery times and costs and analyzing logistics data to identify areas for improvement
  • Building and maintaining relationships with suppliers and vendors and ensuring suppliers comply with company policies and quality standards
  • Analyzing logistics and supply chain data to monitor performance, identify trends, and use data to make informed decisions and recommendations for process improvements.
  • Ensuring compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and company policies and maintaining accurate and up-to-date records and documentation for all logistics activities.
  • Addressing customer inquiries and concerns related to logistics and order fulfillment. Ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction through timely and accurate order processing and delivery and coordinating with the customer service team to resolve any logistics-related issues.
  • Working closely with other departments such as business development, and finance to align logistics activities with overall business objectives. Facilitating communication and coordination between different teams to ensure smooth operations
  • Utilizing logistics software and systems to manage and track inventory, orders, and shipments.

Other Specification 

  • Bachelorâs Running, preferably in supply chain management, logistics, business administration, or a related field.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent organizational and time management abilities.
  • Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Understanding of supply chain and logistics principles.
  • Ability to work well under pressure and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
  • Attention to detail and accuracy.

description:
• Host live streaming sessions to showcase products and engage with customers in real-time.
  • Develop and execute marketing strategies to promote live streaming events and products.
  • Produce high-quality content for social media, website, and other digital platforms.
  • Create compelling videos, graphics, and written content to support marketing and sales initiatives.
  • Work closely with the sales team to develop strategies for increasing product sales through digital channels.
  • Interact with customers through live chat, social media, and other platforms to build relationships and drive loyalty.

Other Specification 

  • Strong sales skills with a track record of achieving or exceeding sales targets.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Proficiency in using live streaming platforms (e.g., Facebook Live, Instagram Live, YouTube) and marketing tools.
  • Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas and content.
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Familiarity with social media trends and best practices.

description:
• Prepare and maintain accurate financial records and statements.
  • Ensure timely and accurate reporting of financial data, including monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.
  • Assist in the preparation of budgets and forecasts.
  • Manage the accounts payable and receivable processes.
  • Ensure timely processing of invoices, payments, and collections.
  • Provide cost analysis and financial insights to support decision-making.
  • Maintain and enhance financial systems and processes to improve efficiency and accuracy.
  • Collaborate with site management and project teams to provide financial support and insights.
  • Act as a liaison between the site and the corporate finance team

Other Specialization:

  • achelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
  • Professional accounting certification (e.g., CPA, ACCA, CIMA) is preferred.
  • Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in accounting or finance roles, preferably in a construction, manufacturing, or project-based environment.
  • Strong knowledge of accounting principles and practices.
  • Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel).
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy.

description:
• Completing writing projects, meeting deadlines and following content requirements in terms of style and project specifications
  • Revising content whenever customers or clients request changes
  • Helping create style guides or suggesting changes to ensure content is consistent and clear
  • Working with customers to define their content needs
  • Conducting research on any given topic
  • Optimizing articles for SEO and accessibility
  • Writing engaging content for blogs, ebooks, case studies, video scripts, infographics and other assets
  • Identifying gaps in content and recommending new topics
  • Editing content to ensure voice, grammar and style is on point
  • Creating and scheduling posts for multiple social media channels
  • Staying up to date on industry trends to support content development
  • Distilling complex concepts and language into content that is easily understood
  • Working closely with internal stakeholders to ensure alignment and consistency in messaging, branding and style
  • Managing and completing work on time for multiple content writing projects
  • Working with content strategists to build editorial calendars

description:
• Assisting with day to day operations of the HR functions and duties
  • Providing clerical and administrative support to Human Resources executives
  • Compiling and updating employee records (hard and soft copies)
  • Process documentation and prepare reports relating to personnel activities (staffing, recruitment, training, grievances, performance evaluations etc)
  • Coordinate HR projects (meetings, training, surveys etc) and take minutes
  • Deal with employee requests regarding human resources issues, rules, and regulations
  • Assist in payroll preparation by providing relevant data (absences, bonus, leaves, etc)
  • Properly handle complaints and grievance procedures
  • Reconciling invoices and identifying discrepancies
  • Creating and updating expense reports
  • Processing reimbursement forms
  • Prepare bank deposits
  • Enter financial transactions into internal databases
  • Check spreadsheets for accuracy
  • Maintain digital and physical financial records
  • Issue invoices to customers and external partners, as needed
  • Review and file payroll documents

  • Prepare bank deposits
  • Enter financial transactions into internal databases
  • Check spreadsheets for accuracy
  • Maintain digital and physical financial records
  • Issue invoices to customers and external partners, as needed
  • Review and file payroll documents

description:
• Provide professional hair styling services to clients based on their preferences and needs.
  • Consult with clients to understand their desired look and offer expert advice on hair care and maintenance.
  • Perform haircuts, color treatments, and styling techniques such as blowouts, curling, and straightening.
  • Keep up-to-date with the latest trends in hair fashion and techniques to offer innovative and on-trend services.

Other Specification:

  • Proven experience as a Hairdresser or Hairstylist, with a portfolio of past work.
  • Certification or license in cosmetology or hairdressing from a recognized institution.
  • Strong knowledge of hair care products, tools, and techniques.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment while maintaining high standards of quality.
  • Creativity and artistic flair with a passion for hair styling and fashion.

description:
The job description of a model for creative development typically includes:

1.Collaboration: Work closely with creative directors, photographers, stylists, and other team members to conceptualize and develop visual content.

2.Creative Input: Offer creative ideas and suggestions to enhance the overall vision of projects.

3.Versatility: Adapt to various themes, concepts, and styles, and bring creativity and innovation to each project.

4.Professionalism: Maintain a positive attitude, adhere to schedules, and communicate effectively with the team.

5.Brand Representation: Represent the brand or client effectively, embodying their values and vision through visual storytelling.

6.Portfolio Development: Continuously work on expanding and diversifying your portfolio with unique and compelling content.

7.Market Awareness: Stay updated on industry trends, styles, and concepts to bring fresh perspectives to projects.

8.Adaptability: Be flexible and open to feedback, adjusting your performance to meet the evolving needs of each project.

9.Attention to Detail: Pay close attention to grooming, styling, and overall presentation to ensure the desired aesthetic is achieved.

10.Networking: Build and maintain relationships within the industry to foster future collaboration opportunities and career growth.

description:
• Develop new menu options based on seasonal changes and customer demand.
  • Assist with the preparation and planning of meal designs.
  • Ensure that kitchen activities operate in a timely manner.
  • Resolve customer problems and concerns personally.
  • Monitor and record inventory, and if necessary, order new supplies.
  • Provide support to junior kitchen employees with various tasks including line cooking, food preparation, and dish plating.
  • Recruit and train new kitchen employees to meet restaurant and kitchen standards.
  • Create schedules for kitchen employees and evaluate their performance.
  • Adhere to and implement sanitation regulations and safety regulations.
  • Manage the kitchen team in the executive chef's absence.

Other Specifications:

  • Proven experience as a Sous Chef or in a similar role within a high-volume kitchen.
  • Strong culinary skills and a passion for food, with knowledge of various cuisines and cooking techniques.
  • Excellent leadership and management abilities, with the capacity to motivate and inspire a team.
  • Exceptional organizational and time management skills to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
  • Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality culinary experiences.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with kitchen staff and other team members.
  • Knowledge of food safety and sanitation regulations, with a focus on maintaining cleanliness and hygiene in the kitchen.
  • Ability to work well under pressure and in a fast-paced environment.
  • Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required.
  • Culinary degree or relevant certification is a plus.

Note: The job location is available at both Budhanilkantha and Biratnagar.

description:
• Accurately measuring meal ingredients for the Chef de Partie.
  • Preparing meal ingredients, which includes seasoning of different meats as well as washing, peeling, and chopping vegetables and fruits.
  • Preparing basic salads and sauces as directed by the Chef de Partie.
  • Receiving deliveries and verifying that all ordered items have been delivered and are of good quality.
  • Taking inventory of restaurant supplies and notifying the supervisor of low or depleted supplies.
  • Discarding all expired and spoiled food items stored in the stock rooms, refrigerators, and freezers.
  • Performing basic cleaning duties and ensuring that workstations are properly sanitized.
  • Plating and presenting meal items as per the Chef de Partieâs instructions.

Note: The job location is available at both Budhanilkantha, Durbar Marg, Mhepi, Anamnagar and Biratnagar.

jobTitle: Customer service cum sales and marketing
description:
This is a full-time on-site role for a Customer Service cum Sales Executive located in Kathmandu. The Customer Service cum Sales Executive will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service, handling inquiries and complaints, assisting customers with product information, and upselling products and services. The role also involves generating sales leads and meeting sales targets.

Qualifications:

  • Excellent customer service and communication skills
  • Strong sales and negotiation skills
  • Ability to handle customer inquiries and complaints
  • Knowledge of sales techniques and strategies
  • Experience in customer service or sales roles
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
  • Strong problem-solving skills
  • Ability to meet sales targets
  • Positive attitude and willingness to learn
  • Education: bachelor completed
  • At list 6 month of experience in sales or customer service

companyName: Bandipur Cable car and Tourism Ltd.
description:
Bandipur Cable Car is a leading provider of scenic cable car rides in the picturesque region of Bandipur. We are committed to offering unforgettable experiences to our visitors while preserving the natural beauty of the area. As part of our expansion and continuous improvement efforts, we are seeking a skilled and experienced Accounts Officer to join our team.

Responsibilities:

  • Aid the legal team in conducting legal research on various topics related to tourism, hospitality, contracts, regulatory compliance, and corporate law.
  • Assist in drafting and reviewing legal documents, such as contracts, agreements, policies, and correspondence.
  • Help maintain and organize legal files and documentation to ensure accuracy and accessibility.

Requirements:

  • Strong interest in corporate law, commercial transactions, and/or tourism law. 
  • Currently pursuing a BALLB/BBM-LLB from a recognized law college.
  • Proficient in legal research tools and MS Office applications.
  • Fluent in English and Nepali typing.
  • Able to commit a minimum of 6 hours per day in the office.
  • Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
  • Good interpersonal and communication abilities.

• Make Phone calls/ Email to potential customers/ Leads.
  • Facilitate lead generation by conducting market research, engaging in cold calling & schedule meetings for PR 
  • Support Supervisor in sales presentations, proposals, and product demonstrations to prospective clients.
  • Provide essential assistance to sales representatives in managing customer database, generating quotes, contract, and addressing customer inquiries.
  • Participating in industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to showcase company products and services.
  • Participate in sales meetings and presentations to gain valuable insights into the sales process and customer interactions.
  • Prepare daily, weekly and monthly reports.

  • Visiting Clients for the contract while necessary.
  • Other task assigned by the manager.

  • Must have good communication skill.
  • Proficiency in MS Office, Internet browsing and market research
  • Punctual and disciplined.
  • Must have own device (Laptop)
  • Own vehicle with a valid driving license is a plus

  • Paid Internship
  • Lunch provided
  • Attractive incentive
  • Exposure to first cyber security platform of Nepal (Bugv)

  • Friendly work environment

  • Support Supervisor in sales presentations, proposals, and product demonstrations to prospective clients.
  • Provide essential assistance to sales representatives in managing customer database, generating quotes, contract, and addressing customer inquiries.
  • Participating in industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to showcase company products and services.
  • Participate in sales meetings and presentations to gain valuable insights into the sales process and customer interactions.
  • Prepare daily, weekly and monthly reports.
  • Helping with the planning and hosting of marketing events.
  • Visiting Clients for the contract while necessary.
  • Other task assigned by the manager.

Specification:

  • Must have good communication skill.
  • Proficiency in MS Office, Internet browsing and market research
  • Punctual and disciplined.
  • Must have own device (Laptop)
  • Own vehicle with a valid driving license is a plus

What We Offer

  • Paid Internship
  • Lunch provided
  • Attractive incentive
  • Exposure to first cyber security platform of Nepal (Bugv)
  • Daily free Lunch
  • Friendly work environment
  • Market exposure
  • Fuel reimbursement for client visit

description:
• Dealing with flat steel products such as MS Pipe, MS Plates, HR Shutter Guides, and CR Shutter Profiles. 
  • Agreements with customers must adhere to the company's strict Sales & Marketing Policies.
  • Sales are only accepted in Bank Guarantee / LC and advance Cash, with payment collections within aging limits of all customers. 
  • Responsibilities include managing key accounts, maintaining client relations,
  • Handling the supply chain to develop strong customer relationships.
  • Maintaining and increasing sales, achieving set targets, expanding the customer base, 
  • Developing sales strategies,
  • Dealt with major customer accounts and stayed updated on products and competitors.

Other Specifications:

  • 10+2/Bachelor Degree in Management/Marketing
  • MALE CANDIDATES ONLY  
  • 1-2 years of experience as a Sales Officer in Manufacturing Companies of Steels Products as mentioned in Job Responsibilities                                                                       

Note: Preference shall be given to male candidates with their own Motorbike and valid Driving License

-Location will be for Kathmandu office

description:
• Overseeing the internal audit process, accounting, and finance of Siddhivinayak Steels Pvt. Ltd. and Goenka Electronics Pvt. Ltd., as well as strategic management and decision-making processes. 
  • This includes financial planning, forecasting, insurance, risk management, interest reconciliation, bank advice, loans, Letter of Credit, MIS reporting, and marketing plans. Experience in trading and manufacturing industries in Nepal is required
  • Be involved in Strategic Management and Decision-making processes before the beginning of the Fiscal Year by reviewing, formulating, drafting, controlling, implementing, measuring, and correcting wise Plans & Policies.
  • Carry out overall Insurance & Risk Management related works.
  • Be responsible for all interest reconciliation and bank advice-related work.
  • Carry out all Letter of Credit (LC) related as well as Insurance related works.
  • Review, plan, formulate, implement, and control all Marketing Plans & Policies of various products under all Companies of Goenka Group.
  • Must have a thorough knowledge of Accounting, Auditing, Tax, and Finance with all banking-related works (Loans, LC, etc.) with experiences in Trading (Import/Export Business) and Manufacturing Industries in Nepal.
  • All other works related to Finance/Accounting/Auditing/Sales Accounting/Marketing/Recovery of all Companies under the Goenka Group as instructed by the department Head (CFO) and the Management.

Other Requirements:

  • Semi-Qualified Chartered Accountants (CA preferably from ICAN-Nepal) but from ICAI are also welcome.
  • 2 + Yrs. experience in LC, Banking, Auditing, Finance, and Accounting work in Manufacturing Industries and Trading Business (Import/Export Business) in Nepal. (preferable Steels/Edible Oil Industries/Consumer Electronics  & FMCG Businesses)
  • Strong knowledge of accounting principles, financial processes, and regulatory requirements.
  • Proficiency in financial software systems and MS Office applications (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
  • Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in financial data management and analysis.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret financial information.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
  • Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong organizational and time management skills.
  • Demonstrated integrity and ethical behavior in handling financial matters.
  • Only male candidates can apply for this position

Note: Salary and perks are as mentioned above but in some cases as negotiable for deserving candidates with exact experiences in the designated positions as mentioned above

description:
A salesperson selling Rikishi compost would typically be responsible for promoting and selling compost products made by Rikishi. The job description might include:

Product Knowledge: Thorough understanding of Rikishi compost products, including their ingredients, benefits, and applications. This knowledge would be crucial for effectively communicating with potential customers and addressing their inquiries.

Sales and Marketing: Developing and implementing sales strategies to promote Rikishi compost products to potential customers, which may include gardeners, farmers, landscaping companies, and agricultural businesses. This involves identifying target markets, generating leads, and converting leads into sales.

Customer Relationship Management: Building and maintaining relationships with customers to understand their needs and provide personalized recommendations. This may involve conducting product demonstrations, offering samples, and providing after-sales support.

Market Research: Keeping abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to identify opportunities for product improvement and market expansion. This information can also be used to adjust sales strategies accordingly.

Networking: Actively engaging in networking activities such as attending industry events, trade shows, and conferences to promote Rikishi compost products and establish connections with potential customers, distributors, and partners.

Order Processing and Fulfillment: Managing the sales process from order placement to delivery, ensuring timely and accurate processing of orders, coordinating with logistics teams, and resolving any issues or discrepancies that may arise.

Sales Reporting and Analysis: Tracking sales performance, preparing sales reports, and analyzing data to evaluate the effectiveness of sales strategies and identify areas for improvement.

Training and Education: Providing training and educational resources to customers and sales team members on the benefits and proper usage of Rikishi compost products.

Overall, the role of a salesperson selling Rikishi compost involves a combination of product knowledge, sales and marketing skills, customer relationship management, and a commitment to achieving sales targets and promoting sustainable and environmentally-friendly gardening and agricultural practices.

description:
Dochaa Pvt. Ltd. is a socially conscious and culturally aware shoe and bag manufacturing company dedicated to creating impact through indigenous storytelling. We believe in the power of storytelling to connect communities and promote cultural heritage. We are seeking a highly motivated and creative individual to join our team. 

Responsibilities:

  • Actively seek out new sales opportunities through field visits, networking, and social media.
  • Present, promote, and sell products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers.
  • Establish, develop, and maintain positive business and customer relationships.
  • Achieve agreed-upon sales targets and outcomes within the schedule.
  • Coordinate sales efforts with team members and other departments.
  • Analyze the marketâs potential, track sales, and status reports.
  • Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
  • Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends.
  • Continuously improve through feedback.

Requirements:

  • Bachelorâs degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
  • Driving License compulsory
  • Highly motivated and target-driven with a proven track record in sales.
  • Excellent selling, negotiation, and communication skills.
  • Relationship management skills and openness to feedback.
  • Familiarity with BRM and CRM practices along with the ability to build productive business professional relationships.
  • Strong organizational and time management skills.
  • Willingness to travel as needed to meet with clients and prospects.

Benefits:

  • Competitive base salary of NPR 8,000 + 3% sales commission.
  • Opportunity to gain valuable experience in a dynamic work environment.
  • Potential for future opportunities within the company.

jobLocation: Milan Chowk Marga, New Baneshwor, Kathmandu, Nepal
description:
As an Online Telecaller, your primary responsibility will be:

  • Make outbound calls to prospective customers in a virtual office setting,
  • Promoting and selling products or services over the phone, 
  • Maintaining customer relationships, and achieving sales targets. 

Other Specifications:

  • Excellent communication skills, 
  • Adaptability to online platforms,
  • Ability to work independently while adhering to company guidelines.

description:
Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve company goals and targets.
  • Lead, mentor, and motivate the sales team to drive performance and exceed sales objectives.
  • Identify new business opportunities and develop relationships with potential clients.
  • Manage key accounts and maintain strong customer relationships.
  • Analyze sales data and market trends to optimize strategies and maximize revenue.
  • Collaborate with marketing and other departments to ensure seamless operations and customer satisfaction.
  • Stay updated on industry developments and competitor activities.
  • Provide ideas and input in formulating and executing effective marketing strategies.
  • Representing the company at major events, client meetings etc.
  • Onboarding new sales and marketing recruits 
  • Develop sales onboarding, training, and development programs

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales, with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
  • Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving business growth.
  • Strong leadership and team management skills.
  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal abilities.
  • Ability to think strategically and solve complex problems.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM software.

Benefits:

  1. Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
  2. Performance-based incentives and bonuses 3% on closed deals.

Dochaa Pvt. Ltd. is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from qualified individuals regardless of race, gender, age, disability, or religion. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further assessment. We look forward to welcoming the newest member to our team!

description:
• Provide prompt and courteous assistance to customers via phone, email, live chat, or in-person interactions.
  • Address customer inquiries, concerns, and issues with professionalism, patience, and empathy.
  • Listen actively to understand customer needs and offer accurate information and solutions.
  • Effectively navigate computer systems, databases, and software to access customer information and provide assistance.
  • Handle customer requests, such as order tracking, product information, billing inquiries, and technical support.
  • Maintain a positive and friendly attitude to create a welcoming customer experience.
  • Handle challenging and demanding customer situations with professionalism and a calm demeanor.
  • Follow up with customers to ensure their inquiries are fully resolved and their needs are met.
  • Participate in ongoing training and professional development to enhance customer service skills.
  • Provide feedback to team leads or supervisors to improve customer service processes.

Other Specification:

  • High school diploma or equivalent; some college education preferred.
  • Previous experience in customer service, retail, or related field is a plus.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Strong active listening skills and the ability to understand customer needs.
  • Proficiency in using computer systems, databases, and software applications.
  • Empathetic and patient approach to handling customer inquiries and concerns.
  • Problem-solving abilities and the capability to think on your feet.
  • Ability to multitask and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Detail-oriented and accurate in data entry and record-keeping.
  • Team player with the ability to work collaboratively and contribute to a positive team atmosphere.
  • Flexibility to work varying shifts, including weekends and holidays if required.
  • Familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) systems is a plus.
